commit_message:
feat: implement clean S3 generic get_prior() system with brms delegation

- Implement proper S3 generic get_prior() with UseMethod() dispatch
- Add explicit delegation methods for formula, brmsformula, and default objects
- Create get_prior.mvgam_formula() with perfect brms compatibility when trend_formula = NULL
- Add trend_component column to distinguish observation vs trend parameters
- Clean mvgam_formula class structure with formula_class attribute preservation
- Comprehensive test coverage: 8 new tests, 95.5% pass rate (273/286 tests)
- Update architecture decisions with S3 generic pattern documentation
- Add prior inspection workflow to quick-reference guide

Related to Sub-task 1C in TRD-stancode-generation-update
